data.description: Perl interface to the Gnome2 Canvas widget
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The gnome canvas widget is a large and independent gtk2 widget. It
    can be used with or without Gnome2. The reason why it's
    Gnome2::Canvas and not Gtk2::Canvas is that there is no "gtk2 canvas
    widget", since, historically, the canvas widget distribution was
    part of the gnome2 libraries. Nowadays it is a seperate library
    that's useful indendent of Gnome2.
